titles.title: A bill to promote and ensure delivery of high-quality special education and related services to students with visual disabilities or who are deaf or hard of hearing or deaf-blind through instructional methodologies meeting their unique learning needs, to enhance accountability for the provision of such services, and for other purposes.
Alice Cogswell and Anne Sullivan Macy Act
Alice Cogswell and Anne Sullivan Macy Act
Alice Cogswell and Anne Sullivan Macy Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
